categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Nuuk Kuur was a Rebel Alliance contact and a farmer on the planet Kwevron. In 0 ABY, he was discovered, along with fellow farmer Idu Taanfaar, and captured by stormtroopers under the command of Falto Dragen, but was later freed by Alliance recruiter Cala Worner and a group of previously uncommitted bystanders.
